txt.en: Your gathered allies await their orders in the planning room to the right of the entrance to the refuge.
Belondor awaits the word to begin the rescue mission.
Your gathered allies await their orders in the planning room to the right of the entrance to the refuge.
The time has come for you to use the table and address the gathering in the planning room to the right of the entrance.
Use the table in the planning room to address the gathering
Give your allies their orders in the planning room of the refuge
Talk to Belondor and go with him to rescue the prisoners
Talk to Belondor and stay behind while he goes to rescue the prisoners
With the heroes imprisoned, it falls to Daxamat to take up the struggle!\n\n<rgb=#00FF00>Daxamat's Refuge is just west of the Waterway Market in Umbar Baharbêl, behind an unassuming door.</rgb>
You have arrived at TBD in time of war.
